TEXT.TITLE: <WERTHEIM SCHRODER AND CO INC> NAMES PRESIDENT
TEXT.BODY: Wertheim Schroder and Co Inc said it appointed Steven Kotler, 40, president of the investment banking and securities firm. Wertheim said Kotler has been a managing director and member of the executive committee of the firm, which is 50 pct owned by <Schroders PLC> of the United Kingdom and 50 pct owned by Wertheim partners. Reuter
